text: And Jehoash king of Judah took all the sacred things that his fathers, Jehoshaphat and Jehoram and Ahaziah, kings of Judah, had dedicated, and his own sacred things, and all the gold found in the treasuries of the house of the LORD and in the kingâ€™s house, and sent  them  to Hazael king of Syria. Then he went away from Jerusalem.
